help.message:
<Title> Help Menu</>

Here you can find the useful commands that you can use in the server:

/rules 
To display the rules of the server

/bbpd 
To pull up the details for the police handbook

/discord 
To get a link to our discord

/features 
To get a list of the features that the server provides

rules.message:
<Title> RULES</>
(Full detail can be found in Discord & the Website): 
-----------
 Check our rules at <Money>https://motortown-bbt.com/#rules</>

discord.message:
<Title> Discord</>

Join our discord: <Money>https://discord.gg/BigBelly</>

You can find there exciting news about the server and the community along

We organize very often server events, you can check them on discord to know when they happen

bbpd.message:
<Title> BBPD</>You can find the handbook here

<Money>https://tinyurl.com/czysddf4</>

You can find it in our discord at <Warning>#bbpd-application</>

police.message:
<Title> Police Patrol Board</>

Remember to do vehicle inspections when doing traffic stops!
